title: Jack Slater IV
description: Tony Vivaldi and the Torelli mob are joining forces to control all drugs in Southern California and they just got Slater’s favorite cousin Frankie involved.
quote: Do you want 60 guys dancing on the lawn throwing cocaine around?
alt1: closeup of a man’s eye that looks like a scope‘s crosshairs
alt2: Slater holding bags of groceries on a porch, a cop with a gun stands by
alt3: an older man tied to a chair with a note labeled “Slater” attached to his shirt
alt4: a car drives by full of men shooting guns
